snippet.title: Babette - Indie Horror Game - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for the upcoming virtual pet horror game 'Babette'

WISHLIST BABETTE NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3140110/Babette/

Summary:
"What a steal! This virtual pet game was almost free at a yard sale two blocks away, and it was just the thing you were looking for! Now it's time to meet Babette, the cute cat that lives inside this bright little casing. Babette is dying to play with you! If you keep her happy, you might gain a friend for life!
The more you take care of Babette, the more things seem off. Feeding her, playing with her, petting her... it becomes more and more difficult. She seems to be developing a mind of her own. Is this cute kitten trying to break free?

Can you keep Babette happy?

Can you keep Babette contained?"

FIND BABETTE HERE
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3140110/Babette/
Itchio: https://roaringluck.itch.io/babette
Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/g/babette
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/babette/918272

Join the Babette Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/VyfZDx6JA5

SOCIALS
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@roaring.luck
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/RoaringLuckGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/RoaringLuck
Twitter: https://www.x.com/roaringluck
